original_title: 酔った職場の先輩と彼女の家で朝までする酔い醒ましのシャワーセックス
overview: A senior at work I happened to meet in the city was terribly drunk, and I decided to send him home. Such a drunken senior is many times cuter than I see at work, and tempts me from the bathroom naked while taking a drunken shower.
title: Hangover Cure Shower Fucking Until Morning With Coworker At Her House
